name: Gone Are The Days

summary_text: Brasserie Valentine is a stylish, funny film about love. About first dates, falling in love and love anniversaries. About love under pressure of daily grind and distrust. And lovingly prepared food. All in one evening on Valentine's Day.

name: Jerry Cotton
summary_text: Jerry Cotton is the best agent of the FBI and suspected of murder. So he has to find the real killers from gangster boss Serrano.

name: Dubai Seenu
summary_text: Seenu - Ravi Teja, is fondly called as Dubai Seenu. His sole aim in life is to fly to Dubai and earn tonnes of money. In the process, he gets hold of a broker and gets duped by him in Mumbai.

name: Death Ride
summary_text: An American photographer (Gamble) has an affair with a mysterious woman (Yoshikawa), which leads him into a confrontation with the occult.

name: Saaya
summary_text: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in ...                See full summary »

name: Varumayin Niram Sigappu
summary_text: Poetical forces play in the life of an unemployed yet well educated young man.He finds the depth and the beauty of his principles yet fate leaves him in destitution

name: Dr. Alien
summary_text: A sexy substitute teacher replaces a teacher who was killed by a UFO encounter, but her research on a nerdy student is now making him a lady magnet.

name: Wielki Szu
summary_text: Released from prison after five years, con-artist Szu is sent packing by his young wife; he heads for the town of Lutyn where he runs a con and attracts the interest of Jurek, a young cab ...                See full summary »

name: Friends
summary_text: A rich English boy meets an orphaned French girl and as they become friends, create a world that is far away from the adult world we live in.

name: Seven Ways from Sundown
summary_text: A Texas Ranger must capture an outlaw and take him-in, while tangling with savage Apaches and greedy bounty-hunters on the way back to jail.

name: Vicki
summary_text: The untimely murder of a New York glamor-girl sparks an investigation with an emotionally driven detective at the helm.

name: My Foolish Heart
summary_text: After being visited by an old friend, a woman recalls her true love, the man she met and lost years ago.

name: The Real Glory
summary_text: A small American contingent tries to train rural tribesmen to defend themselves against fanatical Muslim radicals in 1906 Philippines.

name: Chandu the Magician
summary_text: When delusional madman Roxor kidnaps a scientist in hopes of using his death ray to achieve world dominance, he is opposed by Chandu, a powerful hypnotist and yogi.

name: Love
summary_text: A married woman compromises her social standing and family life when she falls for a young officer.

name: Conquest
summary_text: A young officer, Ivan Demarin, is sent to the depths of Siberia. Here Ivan meets his first love and, together with his regiment, finds himself drawn into a conspiracy by local princes, who are hunting for Yarkand's gold.

name: Ejen Ali: The Movie
summary_text: After being accidentally recruited as a spy, 12-year-old Ejen Ali has now grown to embrace his role in secret agency Meta Advance Tactical Agency (MATA) to protect the futuristic city of Cyberaya from outside threats.

name: My Big Gay Italian Wedding
summary_text: Antonio's finally found the love of his life, Paolo, with whom he lives happily in Berlin. Even if still not sure about their families' reactions, they decide to get married in Italy, in the small village from where Antonio's parents live.

name: Weekend
summary_text: A hunting party of three in Transylvania. The carefree and rich people enjoying themselves. A shooting accident change the scene.

name: Call of the Wolf
summary_text: Kidnapped and trapped by a winter storm, this slow burn thriller follows two strangers who must outsmart an unseen killer.

name: Qissa: The Tale of a Lonely Ghost
summary_text: Umber Singh is a Sikh who loses everything during the separation of India in 1947 and is forced to leave his homeland. He obsessively wishes for a male heir. When his fourth daughter is born, he decides to wage a fight against destiny.

name: De Ontmaagding van Eva van End
summary_text: The members of a dysfunctional family begin to reinvent themselves thanks to the exchange student who moves in with them.

name: Yeto Vellipoyindhi Manasu
summary_text: The ups and downs of a romance between Varun and Nithya from childhood to adolescence.

name: Kikareta onna no mirareta yoru
summary_text: When Ryo, a young magazine reporter, moves into a new apartment he is greeted by the passionate sounds of his astonishingly beautiful neighbor Satsuki. Realizing the wall dividing their ...                See full summary »

name: Dirty Sexy Saint
summary_text: Of all the bars in all of Chicago, she walks into his. Based on the novel by New York Times best-selling authors Carly Phillips and Erika Wilde.

name: Sunshine Barry and the Disco Worms
summary_text: Two lowly earthworms, Gloria and Barry, decide to make the world's greatest disco band which helps them rise from the bottom of the food chain to stardom proving that earthworms can boogie too.

name: The Ape
summary_text: A young writer, nearing a mental breakdown caused by his family and boss, moves into an apartment occupied by a walking, talking, foul-mouthed ape in a Hawaiian shirt and Converse High Tops.

name: Engel & Joe
summary_text: A love story about a 17 year old punk-rocker and a 15 year old runaway girl.

name: Swindle
summary_text: Four thieves attempt to make the richest score in history.

name: The Killer Eye
summary_text: A mad scientist's experiment goes awry, turning a dead homeless man's eyeball into a giant killing machine that has an insatiable appetite for young women.

name: The Telephone
summary_text: A crazy out of work actress, Vashti Blue, spends all her time in her small apartment with her pet owl and her telephone, which she uses to try and solve all her problems with life.

name: Horror House

summary_text: Fisherman Dutch marries cannery worker Hattie. He quits his poorly paid job to concentrate on getting better working conditions as union leader. Unfortunately, the union members disagree ...                See full summary »

name: La niebla y la doncella
summary_text: The corpse of a young man appears in a forest on the island of La Gomera. The case closes with the accusation to a local politician who is exonerated in the later judgment. Three years later, Sergeant Bevilaqua and his assistant, Corporal Chamorro, are sent to the island to revive the investigation. Corporal Anglada accompanies them, the last one who saw the young man alive.

name: Camping 3
summary_text: This year, Patrick decided to test carpooling - Thinking of crossing France with Vanessa, he finds himself with three young dijonnais: Robert the charmer, Benji the beautiful kid and José ...                See full summary »

name: Kagit
summary_text: A moviemaker hands in a script for an arty production in order to receive film funds. Due to political reasons beyond his reach, his film is not provided with a certificate of accreditation. But a true moviemaker never gives up.

name: Alice in Murderland
summary_text: It's Alice's birthday and her sorority girlfriends throw her a themed party. Everyone comes as their favorite, sexy character from Wonderland. The Jabberwocky wasn't invited and brings murder and mayhem to the girls' night out.

name: A Useful Life
summary_text: A movie-theater employee adjusts to a new life after the cinema he worked at for over 25 years is forced to shut down.

name: Uchû shô e yôkoso

summary_text: After several nasty dating surprises, instantaneous HR executive Sarah compiles a 'complete' list of potential partner requirements. After handsome pediatrician and perfect gentleman Erik ...                See full summary »

name: Dad Wanted
summary_text: Blanca's mom stopped letting her ride her BMX bike after her dad died in an accident. So, after reading about a BMX contest happening soon, she tries to enter it without her mom's knowledge. The only problem? A parent needs to sign her in.

summary_text: Mustafa Moradi is aching to find a girlfriend. On the other end of the city, Linnea is desperately searching for a guy with style, courage and a burning passion.

name: Dead Time
summary_text: A jaded cop. A narcoleptic journalist. A nation divided. A Fantasy you'd wish never come true.

name: Fire Serpent
summary_text: Alien creatures emerge from the sun and attack Earth.

summary_text: Black Circle Boys is a taut and compelling drama about one young man's struggle to overcome the tragic loss of his friend.

name: For the Moment
summary_text: The story of airmen training in rural Manitoba in the summer of 1942 to go overseas and become bomber pilots in World War II, as well as the romantic entanglements which overcome them while they contemplate life and love in a world at war.

name: Prem Rog
summary_text: Manorama, the daughter of a rich, orthodox family is married off, leaving her childhood friend Deodhar and his secret love for her, in despair. When tragedy befalls her, and traditions seem unfair, Deodhar must fight for what's right.

name: Hot Rods to Hell
summary_text: The new owner of a motel in the California desert has a run-in with a gang of delinquent teenage hot rod drivers.

name: Warning from Space
summary_text: Warning from Space has one-eyed, starfish-shaped aliens from the planet Paira who take on human forms to warn the earth about the impending disaster.

name: The Good Die Young
summary_text: In London, three otherwise law-abiding good men and their unscrupulous leader are about to commit a serious crime, but for different reasons.

name: The Squaw Man
summary_text: A chivalrous British officer takes the blame for his cousin's embezzlement and journeys to the American West to start a new life on a cattle ranch.

name: Love, of Course
summary_text: Amy is helping her daughter settle into college and lands a job to help with the annual Fall Harvest Festival. When Amy meets Noah, a charismatic, well-traveled professor, she learns more about herself and discovers a new life of her own.

name: Stargate Origins: Catherine
summary_text: In 1939, Professor Paul Langford and his daughter Catherine are still grappling with the mysteries of the ancient relic they discovered in the Egyptian desert more than ten years ago. With ...                See full summary »

name: Martilarin Efendisi

summary_text: Cheval is a postman who travels every day along the Drôme. He meets the woman of his life, Philomena and from their union Alice was born. He then throws himself into a crazy gamble: to build her with his own hands, an incredible palace.

name: I See You
summary_text: A blind woman falls in love with a man who uses kindness and humor to make a connection with her.

name: Maria Bamford: Old Baby
summary_text: Maria Bamford performs a rapid-fire, playful stand-up set for crowds at park benches, bowling alleys and LA theaters in this roving comedy special.

name: Musafir
summary_text: A race between secret service agency and underworld mafia to have classified information of the agency.

name: Soul to Keep
summary_text: Beelzebub, a powerful demon hellbent to possess and consume souls, goes after siblings and their lifelong friends at a rundown country house.

name: Population Zero
summary_text: In 2009 three young men were killed in a remote part of Yellowstone National Park. The only thing more shocking than the crime itself are the bizarre events that followed.

name: Pop Aye
summary_text: On a chance encounter, a disenchanted architect bumps into his long-lost elephant on the streets of Bangkok. Excited, he takes his elephant on a journey across Thailand, in search of the farm where they grew up together.

name: Observance
summary_text: In the grip of grief following the death of his young son, his marriage on the rocks and nearing bankruptcy, Parker reluctantly returns to work as a private investigator. Embarking on an ...                See full summary »

name: Chrysalis
summary_text: Joshua and Penelope are survivors of a deadly infection that laid waste to humanity 25 years ago. When they encounter fellow survivor Abira, their lives are forever changed as they fight off the remnants of the infected.

name: 52nd Fair One Filmfare Awards
summary_text: Add a Plot

name: My Zinc Bed
summary_text: A recovering alcoholic becomes involved with his boss's wife, a former cocaine addict.

summary_text: This action, thriller, is set in Belgrade, Chicago and Kosovo, chronicles the complicated relationship and reunion of estranged brothers, Alex and Peter and the forbidden love of a Serbian ...                See full summary »

name: Dasepo sonyo
summary_text: Based on the Internet comic strip, Multi-Cell Girl (a.k.a Dasepo sonyo) follows the sexual adventures in one seriously bizarre high school.

summary_text: A celebrity actress who gets her dream role playing real-life 19th century serial killer Belle Gunness in a feature film, starts to take on the characteristics of the character both on-screen and off.

name: Ragile Gundelu
summary_text: After her boyfriend jilts her, a vengeful woman returns to wreak havoc in his married life.

name: The Interrogation of Michael Crowe
summary_text: The lives of Escondido, California residents Cheryl and Stephen Crowe change one morning when they find their twelve year old daughter Stephanie Crowe stabbed to death in her bedroom. As ...                See full summary »

name: Barbara the Fair with the Silken Hair
summary_text: A Czar who attempts to trick a creature that demands tribute from him into taking a fisherman's baby instead of his newborn heir. Complications arise when the daughter of the creature, Barbara, requests a human suitor to find true love.

name: Family of Cops
summary_text: A police detective's oversexed daughter is charged with murder when someone kills the wealthy married man she slept with.

name: Sorceress
summary_text: Jealous witch Erica uses her powers to influence her unwitting husband Larry and his colleagues, who all work for a big law firm.

name: In the Mood
summary_text: A 14-year-old nicknamed the 'Woo Woo Kid', is a teenage casanova who has affairs and runs away to marry two older women, mothers themselves, fascinating the public and the media with his romantic prowess.

name: The Swinging Cheerleaders
summary_text: In order to write an expose on how cheerleading demeans women, a reporter for a college newspaper infiltrates the cheerleading squad.

name: Tjorven och Skrållan
summary_text: The residents of Saltkråkan gets new problems when Malin and Peter get their first child - Skrållan.

name: Pepe
summary_text: The young Mexican Pepe's beloved horse is sold to Hollywood star Ted Holt, leading to Pepe's journey to Hollywood to get the horse back, and Pepe's encounter with half the stars working in Hollywood at the time.

name: The Black Orchid
summary_text: Anthony Quinn and Sophia Loren star as longtime widower Frank and recently widowed Rose, lonely hearts who discover something special in The Black Orchid, a sensitive comedy romance directed by Martin Ritt (Norma Rae, Murphy's Romance).

name: Bandido!
summary_text: An arms dealer and a mercenary cross swords during the 1916 Mexican revolution.

name: A Man Alone
summary_text: A gunfighter's main hope lies in the trust of a beautiful woman who hides him out when he is wrongly suspected of a stagecoach massacre.

name: Address Unknown
summary_text: US art dealer returns to his native Germany for a visit and is attracted by Nazi propaganda.

name: La lutte des classes
summary_text: As everyone knows, children make no difference between social classes, skin colors or religions. But then why does Corentin, Paul and Sofia's nine-year-old son, only have friends like him ...                See full summary »

name: 70 Binladens
summary_text: A woman who tries recover her daughter becomes trapped in a bank assault.

name: Golden Job
summary_text: A group of mercenaries come together to pull of an epic heist.

name: Applesauce
summary_text: Two married couples become increasingly agitated with each other as they find out things about each other's past, while one of them is receiving disturbing packages from an unknown source.

name: The Carrier
summary_text: As an antibiotic-resistant pandemic devastates the planet, the only safe place is in the air.

name: Little Thirteen
summary_text: The everyday lives of teenagers, coming from various social backgrounds. For them, sexuality has become a substitute for love, resulting from emotional neglect.
